info.title: Singapur professional-api
info.description:
Professional API to Singapore Project 
 The professional api have the common methods in relation to the user register in the platfform, and offer access to all the functionalities so that the client can manage their profile and operate with the services offered by professionals 
 The operation are:
 -Login
 -Password change, this includes different cases, such as the voluntary change, restoring a forgotten password and reseting it.
 -Check token
 -Email validation
 -Client creation
  Url Confluence https://steps.everis.com/confluence/display/PROLEMER/Endpoint+Login+Client#EndpointLoginClient-Login

username.description:
This atribute contains de emails user 
 Must match the regular expression [A-Za-z0-9]+(?:[\.\-\_]?[A-Za-z0-9]+)+@[A-Za-z0-9]+(?:[\.\-\_][A-Za-z0-9]+)*(?:[\.][A-Za-z0-9]+)+ when mandatory or filled.

password.description:
This atribute contains de password 
 Encoded in base 64

expires_in.description: Expiration date for the access token expresed in minutes

refresh_token.description: Special kind of token that cant be used to obtain a renewed acess token

isChangePasswordRequired.description: When the user logs in for the first time or is blocked, they will be asked to change the their password
